installCommand: mkdir -p flutter-sdk && curl -o flutter.tar.xz https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.16.0-stable.tar.xz && tar -xf flutter.tar.xz -C flutter-sdk --strip-components=1
buildCommand: export PATH="$PATH:$(pwd)/flutter-sdk/bin" && flutter --version && flutter build web
